response.answer_text: I don't know if you heard it but there is the natural law enforcement agency. It is secret agancy that find those who break the laws of nature, but I won't tell you what happens to them. The reason I can tell you about it is it so fancy that people won't believe it anyway.

The only legal prohibition is to those that commit fraud by profiting from the superstitious and ignorant. In anotehr sense of he word it is illegal as it claims to break the laws of nature . there is no such thing as the philosopher stone
